home.title: OBAAS Training - Home
home.welcome: Welcome to the Sopra Banking Software Open Banking Aggregation & Advanced Services Training
home.pitch: The goal of this training exercice is to created a front-end vue.js application that will consume the OBAAS back-end APIs to aggregate the bank accounts of a user.
home.1: Fetch and display the list of ASPSPs available
home.2: Let the user create consents to connect to ASPSPs
home.3: Fetch and display the user's accounts
home.4: Fetch and display the user's accounts' transactions
home.5: Let the user delete his consents

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.sorry: Sorry but the page you requested does not exist.
